channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat Satellite 6 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat Satellite 6 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2014-3590|2024-08-06T10:50:17.612Z -- red%20hat%20satellite%206 -- red%20hat%20satellite%206
item.description: Versions of Foreman as shipped with Red Hat Satellite 6 does not check for a correct CSRF token in the logout action. Therefore, an attacker can log out a user by having them view specially crafted content.
